verses.verse: When <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was a <S%H5288>child<s%>, then I <S%H157>loved<s%> him, and <S%H7121>called<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

As they <S%H7121>called<s%> them, so they <S%H1980>went<s%> from <S%H6440>them<s%>: they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>, and burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> to graven <S%H6456>images<s%>.
I <S%H8637>taught<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> also to <S%H8637>go<s%>, <S%H3947>taking<s%> them by their <S%H2220>arms<s%>; but they <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that I <S%H7495>healed<s%> them.

I <S%H4900>drew<s%> them with <S%H2256>cords<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>, with <S%H5688>bands<s%> of <S%H160>love<s%>: and I was to them as they that take <S%H7311>off<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> on their <S%H3895>jaws<s%>, and I <S%H5186>laid<s%> <S%H398>meat<s%> unto them.

Â¶ He shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, but the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> shall be his <S%H4428>king<s%>, because they <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%>.

And the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H2342>abide<s%> on his <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and shall <S%H3615>consume<s%> his <S%H905>branches<s%>, and <S%H398>devour<s%> them, because of their own <S%H4156>counsels<s%>.

And my <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H8511>bent<s%> to <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> from me: though they <S%H7121>called<s%> them to the most <S%H5920>High<s%>, none at <S%H3162>all<s%> would <S%H7311>exalt<s%> him.

How shall I give thee <S%H5414>up<s%>, <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>? how shall I <S%H4042>deliver<s%> thee, <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? how shall I <S%H5414>make<s%> thee as <S%H126>Admah<s%>? how shall I <S%H7760>set<s%> thee as <S%H6636>Zeboim<s%>? mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> within me, my <S%H5150>repentings<s%> are <S%H3648>kindled<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

I will not <S%H6213>execute<s%> the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of mine <S%H639>anger<s%>, I will not <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>: for I am <S%H410>God<s%>, and not <S%H376>man<s%>; the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee: and I will not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

They shall <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: he shall <S%H7580>roar<s%> like a <S%H738>lion<s%>: when he shall <S%H7580>roar<s%>, then the <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H2729>tremble<s%> from the <S%H3220>west<s%>.

They shall <S%H2729>tremble<s%> as a <S%H6833>bird<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and as a <S%H3123>dove<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>: and I will <S%H3427>place<s%> them in their <S%H1004>houses<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H5437>compasseth<s%> me about with <S%H3585>lies<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H4820>deceit<s%>: but <S%H3063>Judah<s%> yet <S%H7300>ruleth<s%> with <S%H410>God<s%>, and is <S%H539>faithful<s%> with the <S%H6918>saints<s%>.
